Walter Scott Williams, onye a maara dịka Scotty ATL, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, ónyé mmepụta ndekọ na onye ọchụnta ego.

ATL na-ekwu na ọ bụ nne na nna ya abụọ nwere mmasị na hip-hop, na-ekwu maka na nne ya na-akpọkarị 2Pac gburugburu ụlọ.  Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ nwèrè mmasị dị ukwuu na egwu, ya na enyi ya, Eze J, ónyé bụ ónyé na-eti egwu.  ATL jiri ngwá ọrụ ahụ mepụta ụlọ ndekọ n'okpuru ala ezinụlọ ya, wee malite idekọ CD iji ree n'ụlọ akwụkwọ.
Scotty ATL guzobere ákàrá nké ya Cool Club
O wepụtara ọrụ dịka In The Meantime, The Jiffy Cornbread Experience, F.A.I.T.H (Forever Atlanta In The Heart), In The Meantme 2 na SPAGHETTI Junction
N'afọ 2014, ọ sonyeere ónyé na-ese ihe na Grammy B.o.B's No Genre imprint wee malite njem mba niile nke akpọrọ Cool Club Tour
N'afọ sochirinụ, e gosipụtara ya na remix nke Curren$y's "Cloud IX" wee soro ya pụta na The Cooligan, ọrụ egwu iri na isii nke DJ Scream na DJ Mike Mars kwadoro
Mixtape ahụ gosipụtara njikọ aka na Curren$y, CyHi The Prynce, 8Ball, Devin The Dude na B.O.B, yana mmepụta ihe na KE On The Track, DJ Burn One na Drumma Boy.
